data.author: Sirius
data.text: I'll be forever grateful for this to both of you.

data.author: Harry
data.text: I want to go with you.

data.author: Sirius
data.text: For some time, my life will be too unpredictable.

data.author: Sirius
data.text: And besides you're meant to be here.

data.author: Sirius
data.text: And for now, that will do.

data.author: Sirius
data.text: I expect you're tired of hearing this but you look so like your father.

data.author: Sirius
data.text: It's cruel that I spent so much time with James and Lily, and you so little.

data.author: Sirius
data.text: But know this: The ones that love us never really leave us.

data.author: Sirius
data.text: And you can always find them in here.

data.author: Sirius
data.text: You really are the brightest witch of your age.

data.author: Ron
data.text: I was talking to you there.

data.author: Harry
data.text: Honestly, Ron. How can somebody be in two places at once?

data.author: Lupin
data.text: Well, it seems that somebody let slip the nature of my condition.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: This time tomorrow, the owls will start arriving and parents will not want well, someone like me teaching their children.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: Dumbledore has already risked enough on my behalf.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: Well, let's just say that I'm used to it by now.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: Why do you look so miserable, Harry?

data.author: Harry
data.text: None of it made any difference.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: Harry, It made all the difference in the world.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: You saved an innocent man from a terrible fate.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: It made a great deal of difference.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: If I am proud of anything it is of how much you have learned this year.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: Now, since I am no longer your teacher I feel no guilt whatsoever about giving this back to you.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: So now I'll say goodbye, Harry.

data.author: Lupin
data.text: I feel sure we'll meet again sometime.

data.author: Ron
data.text: Stand back, I said! Or I'll take it upstairs if you don't settle.

data.author: Seamus
data.text: Can I have a go, Harry?

data.author: Ron
data.text: I didn't mean to open it, Harry.

data.author: Fred
data.text: It's the fastest broom in the world.

data.author: Harry
data.text: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
